query:
ALTER TABLE payments 
  MODIFY COLUMN paymentMethod ENUM('stripe', 'manual', 'bank_transfer', 'check', 'cash', 'crypto') NOT NULL,
  ADD COLUMN cryptoAmount DECIMAL(24, 18) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN cryptoCurrency VARCHAR(10) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN cryptoNetwork VARCHAR(20) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN cryptoTxHash VARCHAR(100) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN cryptoWalletAddress VARCHAR(100) NULL;

  ADD COLUMN cryptoNetwork VARCHAR(20) NULL,
